description.displayText: Karen was part of our family for almost 1 year and a half. She was wonderful with my daughter- still is since she occasionally babysits. At my house we had a nanny share system with a neighbor. The kids would have so much fun with her! Karen would play with them, teach them stuff and take them outside. Karen has always been able to get on my daughters level and make her happy. At the time Karen lived outside of the city and even though she lived far, she was very punctual and dedicated because she cared about the girls. Definitely recommend her!

description.displayText: Was about 20 minutes late for the phone interview and then again for the face to face interview. She accepted my offer so I fired my other nanny the next day then Karen decided to change her mind and not take the offer. Very unprofessional. Seems like a nice girl but if you are looking for dependable and trustworthy look somewhere else .
